description:
A new costume for Mikasa is added.

▼How to use
You can access the new costume by performing either of the following:
・Select "Another Mode" on the main menu, and then select Mikasa. Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the A Button when you are near the tent on the field.
・Select "Story Mode" on the main menu, and then approach Mikasa in the Daily Life section, or approach her at the regimental base in "Territory Recovery Mode". Change into the costume "One-piece Dress" by pressing the B Button when you are near Mikasa.
name: Additional costume for Mikasa "One-piece Dress" Costume
